# Set-Up
```{r}
devtools::load_all("../racmoR/")
devtools::load_all("../terrapin/")
devtools::load_all("../domR/")
rr <- racmoR::read_racmoM_data("snowmelt")[[1]]
```

```{r}
devtools::load_all("../racmoR/")

terra::plot(rr)
racmoR::draw_antarctica()
terra::plot(rr)
racmoR::draw_antarctica(sbcg = "s")
terra::plot(rr)
racmoR::draw_antarctica(sbcg = "b")
terra::plot(rr)
racmoR::draw_antarctica(sbcg = "bb")
terra::plot(rr)
racmoR::draw_antarctica(sbcg = "c")
terra::plot(rr)
racmoR::draw_antarctica(sbcg = "g")
```

```{r}
devtools::load_all("../racmoR/")
extentArgs <- list()
extentArgs$crs    <- "racmo"
# extentArgs$extent <- ""
# extentArgs$extent <- rr
# extentArgs$extent <- t1
# extentArgs$extent <- "Amery"
extentArgs$extent <- terra::ext(x = c(-5, 5, -10, 0))
extentArgs$crsIn  <- "racmo"

t1 <- do.call(get_shelf_outline, args = extentArgs)
terra::plot(t1)
```

```{r}
t2 <- terra::project(t1, use_crs("racmo"))
terra::plot(t2)
```

```{r}
use_crs("racmo")
```
